column5: I bought the Marcum VX-1 last year & I am quite satisfied with the unit, but it doesn't come with a soft pack & I'd like to get one for it! I've looked on Marcum's website & they don't appear to have one for it...does anyone know if/where you can get one? Or, if a Vex soft pack would fit??
buddy has the vx1 and ended buying a soft pack from vex....fits and works perfectly
Hey Johnny.  Someone else told me that the Vexilar soft pack will fit as well.  Im head'n to springwater right now for some crappie.  You interested???
